html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-05952023-06-21PCH
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of MARK FERRARI of Burnaby, British Columbia, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum for Human Rights, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Robert Philpott, whose term will expire.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of MARK FERRARI of Burnaby, British Columbia, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum for Human Rights, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Robert Philpott, whose term will expire.
